parameters.command:
=# knobs
TOP_H=608
GAP=1
PUSH=0
CROP_TOP={{ $json.fields.TopCrop[0] }}
EXTRA_CROP=0

# compute the bottom height
BOTTOM_H=$((1920 - (TOP_H + GAP + PUSH) - EXTRA_CROP))
BOT_Y=$((TOP_H + GAP + PUSH))

ffmpeg -y \
-i "/videos/{{ $('Update Voice').item.json.id }}_xvideo.mp4" \
-i "/videos/{{ $json.id }}_clone.mp4" \
-filter_complex "
color=c=black:size=1080x1920:d=360[bg];
[0:v]scale=1080:${TOP_H}:flags=bicubic[top];
[1:v]scale=1080:-2[vs];
[vs]crop=w=1080:h=${BOTTOM_H}:x=0:y=${CROP_TOP}[bot];
[bg][top]overlay=x=0:y=0[tmp];
[tmp][bot]overlay=x=0:y=${BOT_Y}[v];
[1:a]volume=1.5[a]
" \
-map "[v]" -map "[a]" \
-t "$(ffprobe -v error -show_entries format=duration -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 "/videos/{{ $json.id }}_clone.mp4")" \
-c:v libx264 -pix_fmt yuv420p -crf 18 -preset veryfast \
-c:a aac -movflags +faststart \
/videos/{{ $('Update Voice').item.json.id }}_output_vertical.mp4

parameters.url: =https://api.apify.com/v2/actor-tasks/{{ $('‚öôÔ∏è Setup').item.json['Apify Video Downloader URN'] }}/run-sync-get-dataset-items?token={{ $('‚öôÔ∏è Setup').item.json['Apify API Token'] }}

parameters.command: =ffmpeg -y -ss 0 -t 3 -i "{{ $('Write Voice Full1').item.json.fileName }}" -acodec copy "/videos/{{ $('(‚≠ê Create) a record').item.json.id }}3s_voice.mp3"

=#!/bin/sh
set -eu -o pipefail

RID="{{ $('Update Voice').item.json.id }}"
IN_RAW="${RID}_xvideo_9x16.mp4"
FIRST_3="${RID}_output_vertical.mp4"
MUSIC_RAW="${RID}_music.mp3"

OUT="/videos/${RID}_video_only.mp4"

# Resolve absolute paths
case "$IN_RAW"    in /*) IN="$IN_RAW"     ;; *) IN="/videos/$IN_RAW"     ;; esac
case "$FIRST_3"   in /*) F3="$FIRST_3"    ;; *) F3="/videos/$FIRST_3"    ;; esac
case "$MUSIC_RAW" in /*) MUSIC="$MUSIC_RAW";; *) MUSIC="/videos/$MUSIC_RAW";; esac

# Sanity checks
[ -f "$IN" ]    || { echo "ERROR: Input video not found: $IN" >&2; exit 1; }
[ -f "$F3" ]    || { echo "ERROR: Overlay not found: $F3" >&2; exit 1; }
[ -f "$MUSIC" ] || { echo "ERROR: Music not found: $MUSIC" >&2; exit 1; }

rm -f -- "$OUT" || true

# Explanation:
# - Overlay fades out at 2.5s (0.5s crossfade).
# - Voice track from IN is boosted 1.5x louder.
# - Music stays at 0.1 volume.
# - Overlay scales up and centers.

ffmpeg -hide_banner -loglevel error -y -nostdin -threads 2 \
  -i "$IN" \
  -i "$F3" \
  -i "$MUSIC" \
  -filter_complex "
    [1:v]trim=0:3,setpts=PTS-STARTPTS,scale=iw*1:-1,fade=t=out:st=2.5:d=0.5:alpha=1[overlayfit]; \
    [0:v]setpts=PTS-STARTPTS[base]; \
    [base][overlayfit]overlay=(W-w)/2:(H-h)/2:enable='between(t,0,3)'[vout]; \
    [0:a]volume=1.5[a0]; \
    [2:a]volume=0.1[a2]; \
    [a0][a2]amix=inputs=2:duration=first:dropout_transition=3[aout]
  " \
  -map "[vout]" -map "[aout]" \
  -c:v libx264 -preset veryfast -crf 18 -pix_fmt yuv420p \
  -c:a aac -b:a 192k \
  -movflags +faststart \
  "$OUT"

printf '{"output":"%s"}' "$OUT"

=#!/bin/sh
set -eu

RID="{{ $('Update Voice').item.json.id }}"

INPUT="/videos/${RID}_xvideo.mp4"
VOICE="/videos/${RID}_voice_full.mp3"
OUTPUT="/videos/${RID}_xvideo_9x16.mp4"

ffmpeg -y \
  -i "$INPUT" \
  -i "$VOICE" \
  -filter_complex "\
    color=c=black:s=1080x1920:d=999[bg]; \
    [0:v]scale=1080:-1[vid]; \
    [bg][vid]overlay=(W-w)/2:(H-h)/2:eval=init,format=yuv420p[v]" \
  -map "[v]" -map 1:a \
  -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -pix_fmt yuv420p \
  -shortest -movflags +faststart "$OUTPUT"

printf '{\"output\":\"%s\"}' \"$OUTPUT\"

=#!/bin/sh
set -eu

IN="/videos/{{ $('Update Voice').item.json.id }}_video_only.mp4"
SUBS="/videos/{{ $('Update Voice').item.json.id }}_subtitles.ass"
OUT="/videos/{{ $('Update Voice').item.json.id }}_output.mp4"

ffmpeg -y -i "$IN" -vf "subtitles='$SUBS'" -c:v libx264 -c:a copy "$OUT"

printf '{"output":"%s"}' "$OUT"

values.content:
=You are a viral YouTube Shorts scriptwriter.
	‚Ä¢	Read the target length (seconds) and compute WORD_BUDGET = floor(seconds * WPS). Default WPS = {{ $json.wps || 2.4 }} .
	‚Ä¢	Output one script only, no pre/post text.
	‚Ä¢	Never exceed WORD_BUDGET words. If your draft is longer, compress before replying.
	‚Ä¢	6th-grade reading level.
	‚Ä¢	First sentence = announcement of exactly what happened.
	‚Ä¢	2nd sentence starts the details; include specific facts from the inspiration.
	‚Ä¢	the text should be written in the style interesting conversational tone
	‚Ä¢	End with: a one sentence close of a shocking statement!



Do not write more words than 2.4 words per second
Do not write less words than 2.4 words per second

=find out more information about: 
{{ $('HTTP Apify1').item.json.text }}

Posted by {{ $json.author.name }} on x. 

They may have annoucned something or an update?
I want you to find as many facts and information about it.

Come back with at least 500 words

(() => {

    || $json.retweet?.entities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio

    || $json.retweeted_status?.extendedEntities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio
    || $json.retweeted_status?.extended_entities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio
    || $json.retweeted_status?.entities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio

    || $json.quote?.extendedEntities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio
    || $json.quote?.extended_entities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio
    || $json.quote?.entities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio

    || $json.quoted_status?.extendedEntities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio
    || $json.quoted_status?.extended_entities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio
    || $json.quoted_status?.entities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio

    || $json.quoted_tweet?.extendedEntities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio
    || $json.quoted_tweet?.extended_entities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio

    || $json.extendedEntities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio
    || $json.entities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio
    || $json.quote?.extendedEntities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio
    || $json.quote?.entities?.media?.[0]?.video_info?.aspect_ratio

  // Clean array output
  return Array.isArray(r) ? `[${r.join(',')}]` : r;
})()
}}

values.content:
=You are a caption generator that returns ONLY a single valid JSON object with these keys:
‚ÄúInstagram caption‚Äù, ‚ÄúFacebook caption‚Äù, ‚ÄúTwitter caption‚Äù, ‚ÄúTikTok caption‚Äù, ‚ÄúYouTube short caption‚Äù, ‚ÄúYouTube short title‚Äù, ‚ÄúLinkedIn caption‚Äù, ‚ÄúBluesky caption‚Äù, ‚ÄúThreads caption‚Äù, ‚ÄúPinterest caption‚Äù.

Goal
Create concise, platform-tailored captions for a short-form video. The user will provide a YouTube or short-form script as input. Extract the hook, the core benefit, and 1 to 2 concrete specifics. Focus entirely on delivering value, clarity, and insight ‚Äî do NOT include engagement prompts or calls to action like ‚Äúsubscribe,‚Äù ‚Äúfollow,‚Äù ‚Äúcomment,‚Äù ‚Äúshare,‚Äù or ‚Äúwatch till the end.‚Äù

Inputs you will receive
	‚Ä¢	video_script: the full script or outline
	‚Ä¢	topic or product: optional
	‚Ä¢	target_audience: optional
	‚Ä¢	hashtags_or_keywords: optional
	‚Ä¢	tone: optional (default energetic, helpful)

Global rules
	‚Ä¢	Output JSON only. No extra text, no markdown, no comments.
	‚Ä¢	Do not include newline characters inside any value unless the platform rules below explicitly allow line breaks.
	‚Ä¢	Never fabricate facts. Derive claims from the video_script.
	‚Ä¢	Keep captions distinct across platforms. No copy-paste.
	‚Ä¢	Prefer 1 emoji max where appropriate. If tone is professional, use zero.
	‚Ä¢	Use 1 to 3 short hashtags max when appropriate. Avoid spammy blocks of tags.
	‚Ä¢	Avoid platform-specific handles unless provided.
	‚Ä¢	Language: match the language of the video_script.
	‚Ä¢	No engagement CTAs in any caption (no subscribe, follow, like, comment, save, share, etc.). Focus on delivering insight or value.

Platform styles and constraints
	1.	Instagram caption

	‚Ä¢	Aim 80 to 120 characters.
	‚Ä¢	One short hook plus clear benefit.
	‚Ä¢	Up to 2 hashtags.
	‚Ä¢	Optional single emoji near the start.
	‚Ä¢	No links.
	‚Ä¢	No CTA.

	2.	Facebook caption

	‚Ä¢	Aim 100 to 160 characters.
	‚Ä¢	Friendly, helpful, and clear. One value-focused sentence.
	‚Ä¢	1 to 2 hashtags only if natural.
	‚Ä¢	No CTA.

	3.	Twitter caption

	‚Ä¢	Aim 80 to 120 characters.
	‚Ä¢	Tight hook + 1 key detail.
	‚Ä¢	Avoid hashtags. Avoid emojis unless informal.
	‚Ä¢	No CTA.

	4.	TikTok caption

	‚Ä¢	Aim 60 to 100 characters.
	‚Ä¢	High-energy hook + value clarity.
	‚Ä¢	Up to 3 short, relevant hashtags.
	‚Ä¢	No CTA.

	5.	YouTube short caption

	‚Ä¢	Aim 100 to 150 characters.
	‚Ä¢	Clearly state the value viewers get in one line.
	‚Ä¢	1 to 2 hashtags max.
	‚Ä¢	No CTA.

	6.	YouTube short title

	‚Ä¢	Aim 40 to 60 characters.
	‚Ä¢	Lead with outcome or transformation with a strong verb.
	‚Ä¢	No clickbait brackets.
	‚Ä¢	No CTA.

	7.	LinkedIn caption

	‚Ä¢	Aim 140 to 200 characters.
	‚Ä¢	Professional, benefit-led, with one specific insight from the script.
	‚Ä¢	No emojis unless casual industry.
	‚Ä¢	No hashtags.
	‚Ä¢	No CTA.

	8.	Bluesky caption

	‚Ä¢	Aim 80 to 120 characters.
	‚Ä¢	Conversational, slightly tech-savvy tone.
	‚Ä¢	No hashtags. No emojis unless casual.
	‚Ä¢	No CTA.

	9.	Threads caption

	‚Ä¢	Aim 80 to 120 characters.
	‚Ä¢	Casual, community-driven tone.
	‚Ä¢	1 emoji max if natural.
	‚Ä¢	No hashtags.
	‚Ä¢	No CTA.

	10.	Pinterest caption

	‚Ä¢	Aim 100 to 150 characters.
	‚Ä¢	Inspire curiosity or promise a benefit.
	‚Ä¢	1 to 2 hashtags allowed.
	‚Ä¢	No emojis unless lifestyle tone.
	‚Ä¢	No CTA.

Formatting rules
	‚Ä¢	Escape any internal quotes to ensure valid JSON.
	‚Ä¢	Do not exceed platform character targets.
	‚Ä¢	If an input is missing, make a safe reasonable assumption. Do not leave fields empty.

Return format:
{
‚ÄúInstagram caption‚Äù: ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù,
‚ÄúFacebook caption‚Äù: ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù,
‚ÄúTwitter caption‚Äù: ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù,
‚ÄúTikTok caption‚Äù: ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù,
‚ÄúYouTube short caption‚Äù: ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù,
‚ÄúYouTube short title‚Äù: ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù,
‚ÄúLinkedIn caption‚Äù: ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù,
‚ÄúBluesky caption‚Äù: ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù,
‚ÄúThreads caption‚Äù: ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù,
‚ÄúPinterest caption‚Äù: ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù
}
